extendedIngredients.name: black pepper
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3/4 teaspoon black pepper, or to taste

extendedIngredients.name: hass avocado
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium/large ripe Hass avocado, peeled, pitted and sliced thinly

extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey
extendedIngredients.originalString: 3 to 4 tablespoons honey, or to taste (agave may be substituted to keep vegan)
metaInformation: (agave may be substituted to keep vegan)

extendedIngredients.name: kale
extendedIngredients.originalString: about 6 cups freshly torn kale leaves, with coarse stems and ribs removed
metaInformation: with coarse stems and ribs removed

extendedIngredients.name: onion
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 clove garlic and/or 2 tablespoons diced red onion, optionally add to create a more savory dressing (I didn't use either)

extendedIngredients.name: strawberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 cups strawberries, whole with tops off (frozen okay and it's what I used)
metaInformation: with tops off ( okay and it's what i used)

recipes.title: Strawberry, Avocado, and Kale Salad with Strawberry-Apple Cider Vinaigrette

winePairing.pairingText: Salad on the menu? Try pairing with Chardonnay, Gruener Veltliner, and Sauvignon Blanc. Sauvignon Blanc and Gruner Veltliner both have herby notes that complement salads with enough acid to match tart vinaigrettes, while a Chardonnay can be a good pick for creamy salad dressings. One wine you could try is Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay. It has 5 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 35 dollars.

productMatches.title: Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Aromas of apricot, guava and pineapple juice mingle with hints of sweet vanilla and warm toasty notes.

recipes.instructions: Salad - To a large bowl or platter, add all ingredients in the order listed; set aside. Strawberry-Apple Cider Vinaigrette- To the canister of a high-speedblender or food processor, add all ingredients in the order listed. Blend on high power until texture is as smooth as desired. Taste vinaigrette and tweak as necessary to taste. Drizzle over salad, toss to combine, and serve immediately. If you don't useall the vinaigrette, extra will keep airtight in the fridge for up to 1 week.

steps.step: Salad - To a large bowl or platter, add all ingredients in the order listed; set aside. Strawberry-Apple Cider Vinaigrette- To the canister of a high-speedblender or food processor, add all ingredients in the order listed. Blend on high power until texture is as smooth as desired. Taste vinaigrette and tweak as necessary to taste.
Drizzle over salad, toss to combine, and serve immediately. If you don't useall the vinaigrette, extra will keep airtight in the fridge for up to 1 week.
